_json.gridTitle: Spanx Shapewear, Waist Cinchers, Magic Knickers & Slimming Underwear
_json.description: If you wear shapewear, you really need to read this! It is my 5 top tips on combating the dreaded shapewear roll down. We all love high waisted shapewear. It is the stuff that slims right up to your bra line. It CAN create the most lovely, slim line under your clothes. However, if it doesnâ€™t fit you correctly, it will roll down. Too big or too small, the roll down will happen. Find out what you can do about it on a night out on my shapewear blog. #spanx #shapewear
